name: Forest Errands
description:
Forest Errands is a "Point and Click" style Game where you will explore a wooded area as "leandro" discovering the Ranger night shift, your objective being to verify that everything is Quiet so you can take a nap


Important Information

* Areas marked with a red box, arrows, or shapes represent movement, and things with a slight shake represent interactable things 

 * To delete / restore the save file, use the "Reset" button located in options in the main menu 

 * To save the game, enter the guard booth

 

Notes from developers

This is our first public project, and it's possible that you may find a bug. If you encounter with one, please leave a comment with it!

Also keep in mind that english is not our native languaje. We did as much as we can, so if you would like to help us improving the english version, please let us know!!"
developers: M O I Z E Z
